org.codehaus.preon.el
Class ImplicitsContext<E>

java.lang.Object

Type Parameters:
E -
All Implemented Interfaces:
Descriptive, ReferenceContext<E>
public class ImplicitsContext<E>
extends Object
implements ReferenceContext<E>

A context that 'imports' constant references such as true and false.

selectAttribute

public Reference<E> selectAttribute(String name)
                             throws BindingException
Description copied from interface: ReferenceContext
Creates a new Reference; the new Reference will be resolved by first resolving the current reference, and then use the name to navigate to another object associated to that object.

Specified by:
selectAttribute in interface ReferenceContext<E>
Parameters:
name - The name to be used to resolve the Reference.
Returns:
A new Reference, pointing to the object that is related to the original object by the given name.
Throws:
BindingException
